Description: Unique, synthetic identifier for the student (KIPTX######).
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Primary student identification for all state submissions.

Description: TEA-assigned identifier for the student's campus (e.g., '101901001').
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Links student data to a specific campus for funding and reporting.
Required field for all state reporting collections.
Used to verify eligibility for membership days.

Description: Indicates if the student is served by Special Education ('Yes' / 'No').
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Determines eligibility for Special Program funding (SPED FTE).

Description: Indicates if the student is served by a Bilingual/ESL program ('Yes' / 'No').
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Determines eligibility for Bilingual Program funding (Bilingual ADA).

Description: Total instructional days student was marked present up to the mid-year submission date (approx. 90 days).
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Contributes directly to the calculation of Average Daily Attendance (ADA).

Description: Total instructional days student was marked absent up to the mid-year submission date.
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Primary factor for Chronic Absenteeism calculation and funding adjustments.

Description: Total minutes of instruction received by the student.
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Verifies required minutes for full-day/half-day ADA eligibility.

Description: Total minutes of special education services *required* per the student's IEP (up to submission date).
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: The mandated baseline for compliance monitoring.

Description: Total minutes of special education services *actually delivered* (up to submission date).
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Used to calculate the Service Shortfall/Compliance Ratio in the audit view.

Description: The official SAAH code used for attendance reporting (e.g., 'A' Present, 'Z' Remote Asynchronous, '1' Absent).
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: The high-stakes code that determines eligibility for Foundation School Program (FSP) funding.

Description: Date the record was flagged for manual review due to a potential compliance or data integrity issue (simulated).
PEIMS/SAAH Context & Role: Supports tracking and prioritization of data remediation efforts.
